Package com.simon

This package contains two separate Java applets.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PingClient
    Server to process ping requests over UDP.
    PingServer
    Server to process ping requests over UDP.
    RUC
    A model for a reliable UDP client.
    RUS
    Reliable UDP server that receives file sent by RUC.

Package com.simon Description

This package contains two separate Java applets. The first is a UDP ping sender, which can connect and send pings to a server through UDP. The second is a Reliable UDP client/server applet that will send a file through UDP and ensure its arrival through a SYN/ACK GBN protocol. It is currently configured to send a gibberish text file contained in the package, but a comment within the RUC method can be deleted to allow file specification through terminal arguments. Specific citations for code are given at each relevant class. Created by Simon on 10/21/2016.
